objects.text:
• Exquisite Aroma & Taste
• Strong & Robust Flavor
• Finest Tea Gardens of Assam
• Perfect Color Infusion

Elevate Your Tea Time
Savor the Flavors of Assam

product_details.name: Society Premium Tea | Premium Leaf Tea | Strong & Robust Blend | Kadak Chai | Special blend from Finest tea gardens of Assam | 1 kg pack
product_details.description: Crushed, twisted and curled each tea leaf is carefully picked to create and amalgamation of exquisite aroma and taste. The CTC process ensures that the Society tea offers the perfect infusion of rich color and strong flavor providing each customer a cuppa to cherish.

banner_details:
This premium tea banner design features a luxurious and elegant layout with a bold, serif heading ("heading") in gold to emphasize the brand name and tea type. Just beneath, a refined subheading ("subheading") highlights the tea blend. Key selling points are provided in a clean bullet list ("description") positioned to the left for easy readability. A classy tagline ("tagline") further elevates the product's appeal with poetic language.

The price ("price") is prominently displayed in a large bold font, supported by a striking yellow call-to-action button ("cta_button") with matching button text ("cta"). The product image ("product_image") is placed to the right and integrated seamlessly into a dark and rich diagonal background, creating depth and contrast.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Brown: #2D1A0D
- Rich Gold: #D4AF37
- Soft Yellow Gold: #F1D989
- Muted Tan: #E5D3A3
- Dark Chocolate: #4A2A15

The overall design encapsulates a luxurious and flavorful tea experience, suggesting premium quality and heritage.
product_color: The product image uses a sleek and elegant color palette that enhances its premium appeal. The dominant background color is a deep **charcoal black (#1B1B1B)**, conveying sophistication and contrast. The brand name "SOCIETY" and the text "Premium Tea" are highlighted in a rich **golden yellow (#D4A441)**, exuding luxury and tradition. The "TEA" in the label adds a vibrant pop of **red (#D62321)** and **yellow (#F9E03C)**, catching attention effectively. The tea in the cup is an inviting **amber orange (#F78A1F)**, symbolizing warmth and richness. These colors are well-blended using gradients and reflections, yet distinct to emphasize brand identity.
